---
id: TokenInstructions
title: Token Instructions
sidebar_label: Token Instructions
sidebar_position: 4
---

If the third-party platform needs to access a **user-authorized interface**, you must add an additional `access-token` field to the request **Header**.

How to obtain an `access-token`: please refer to [here](http://localhost:3000/docs/trading-third-party/OAuth%20Interface/RefreshToken).
